resources.string:
Required Classes
- MediaStore.Audio: to get the necessary URIs.
- ContentProvider: to get the audio files.

And then filter out the files based on the gender.
Finally, a list of playlists will be displayed.
From which the user can go into the songs.

Required Classes
- MediaStore.Audio: to get the necessary URIs.
- ContentProvider: to get the audio files.
- MediaPlayer: to reproduce the audio files.

And then filter out the files based on the context.
Finally, a list of songs will be displayed.
From which the user can reproduce the song.

Required Classes
- MediaStore.Audio: to get the necessary URIs.
- ContentProvider: to get the audio files.

And then filter out the files based on the album.
Finally, a list of albums will be displayed.
From which the user can go into the songs.

Required Classes
- MediaStore.Audio: to get the necessary URIs.
- ContentProvider: to get the audio files.

And then filter out the files based on the artist.
Finally, a list of artists will be displayed.
From which the user can go into the songs.
